name: Travel Greetings and Introductions
description: Common greetings and introduction phrases useful when traveling.

vocabularies.definition: A greeting used to acknowledge someone's presence.
vocabularies.sentence: Hello! Is this the check-in counter?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Konnichiwa! Koko wa chekkuin kauntā desu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: こんにちは！ここはチェックインカウンターですか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Nǐ hǎo! Zhè lǐ shì bàn dēng jī guì tái ma?
translations.translated_sentence: 你好！这里是办登机柜台吗？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hello! Is this the check-in counter?
translations.translated_sentence: Hello! Is this the check-in counter?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Annyeonghaseyo! Yeogi chekeu-in kaunteoyeyo?
translations.translated_sentence: 안녕하세요! 여기 체크인 카운터예요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Xin chào! Đây có phải là quầy check-in không?
translations.translated_sentence: Xin chào! Đây có phải là quầy check-in không?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Halo! Apakah ini konter check-in?
translations.translated_sentence: Halo! Apakah ini konter check-in?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sà-wàt-dii! Nîi khue thîi check-in rɯ̌ɯ plàao?
translations.translated_sentence: สวัสดี! นี่คือที่เช็คอินหรือเปล่า?

vocabularies.definition: A casual greeting used to say hello.
vocabularies.sentence: Hi! Can you help me with directions?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hai! Michi o oshiete kudasai?
translations.translated_sentence: ハイ！道を教えてください？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hāi! Nǐ néng bāng wǒ zhǐ lù ma?
translations.translated_sentence: 嗨！你能帮我指路吗？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hi! Can you help me with directions?
translations.translated_sentence: Hi! Can you help me with directions?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Annyeong! Gil jom allyeo jusil su isseoyo?
translations.translated_sentence: 안녕! 길 좀 알려주실 수 있어요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chào! Bạn có thể chỉ đường cho tôi không?
translations.translated_sentence: Chào! Bạn có thể chỉ đường cho tôi không?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hai! Bisakah Anda membantu saya dengan petunjuk arah?
translations.translated_sentence: Hai! Bisakah Anda membantu saya dengan petunjuk arah?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hāi! Khun chûai bòok thaang hâi dâi mái?
translations.translated_sentence: ไฮ! คุณช่วยบอกทางให้ได้ไหม?

vocabularies.definition: A greeting used in the morning hours.
vocabularies.sentence: Good morning! I have a reservation.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Ohayou gozaimasu! Yoyaku o totte imasu.
translations.translated_sentence: おはようございます！予約を取っています。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Zǎo shàng hǎo! Wǒ yǒu yù dìng.
translations.translated_sentence: 早上好！我有预订。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Good morning! I have a reservation.
translations.translated_sentence: Good morning! I have a reservation.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Joeun achim! Yeyageul haesseoyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 좋은 아침! 예약을 했어요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chào buổi sáng! Tôi có đặt chỗ.
translations.translated_sentence: Chào buổi sáng! Tôi có đặt chỗ.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Selamat pagi! Saya punya reservasi.
translations.translated_sentence: Selamat pagi! Saya punya reservasi.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Arun sawàt! Phǒm mii kaan jòng.
translations.translated_sentence: อรุณสวัสดิ์! ผมมีการจอง.
translations.translated_word: อรุณสวัสดิ์

vocabularies.definition: A greeting used in the afternoon.
vocabularies.sentence: Good afternoon! Where is the taxi stand?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Konnichiwa! Takushī noriba wa doko desu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: こんにちは！タクシー乗り場はどこですか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Xià wǔ hǎo! Chū zū chē zhàn zài nǎ lǐ?
translations.translated_sentence: 下午好！出租车站在哪里？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Annyeonghaseyo! Taeksi seunggangjang eodi isseoyo?
translations.translated_sentence: 안녕하세요! 택시 승강장 어디 있어요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chào buổi chiều! Bến taxi ở đâu?
translations.translated_sentence: Chào buổi chiều! Bến taxi ở đâu?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Selamat siang! Dimana pangkalan taksi?
translations.translated_sentence: Selamat siang! Dimana pangkalan taksi?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sawàt-dii tawn baai! Thîi jòot taxi yùu thîi nǎi?
translations.translated_sentence: สวัสดีตอนบ่าย! ที่จอดแท็กซี่อยู่ที่ไหน?
translations.translated_word: สวัสดีตอนบ่าย

vocabularies.definition: A greeting used in the evening.
vocabularies.sentence: Good evening! Can I book a tour for tomorrow?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Konbanwa! Ashita no tsua o yoyaku dekimasu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: こんばんは！明日のツアーを予約できますか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǎn shàng hǎo! Wǒ kě yǐ yù dìng míng tiān de lǚ yóu ma?
translations.translated_sentence: 晚上好！我可以预订明天的旅游吗？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Good evening! Can I book a tour for tomorrow?
translations.translated_sentence: Good evening! Can I book a tour for tomorrow?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Joeun jeonyeok! Naeil tueoreul yeyakhal su isseoyo?
translations.translated_sentence: 좋은 저녁! 내일 투어를 예약할 수 있어요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chào buổi tối! Tôi có thể đặt tour cho ngày mai không?
translations.translated_sentence: Chào buổi tối! Tôi có thể đặt tour cho ngày mai không?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Selamat malam! Bisakah saya memesan tur untuk besok?
translations.translated_sentence: Selamat malam! Bisakah saya memesan tur untuk besok?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sawàt-dii tawn yen! Jòng thîao wai phruŋnii dâi mái?
translations.translated_sentence: สวัสดีตอนเย็น! จองเที่ยวไว้พรุ่งนี้ได้ไหม?
translations.translated_word: สวัสดีตอนเย็น

vocabularies.definition: A farewell used when leaving someone.
vocabularies.sentence: Goodbye! Thank you for your help.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sayounara! Tasukete kurete arigatou gozaimasu.
translations.translated_sentence: さようなら！助けてくれてありがとうございます。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Zài jiàn! Xiè xiè nǐ de bāng zhù.
translations.translated_sentence: 再见！谢谢你的帮助。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Goodbye! Thank you for your help.
translations.translated_sentence: Goodbye! Thank you for your help.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Annyeonghi gaseyo! Dowajusyeoseo gamsahamnida.
translations.translated_sentence: 안녕히 가세요! 도와주셔서 감사합니다.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chào tạm biệt! Cảm ơn bạn đã giúp đỡ.
translations.translated_sentence: Chào tạm biệt! Cảm ơn bạn đã giúp đỡ.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Selamat tinggal! Terima kasih atas bantuan Anda.
translations.translated_sentence: Selamat tinggal! Terima kasih atas bantuan Anda.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Laa-gɔ̀ɔn! Khɔ̀ɔp-khun thîi chûai lɯ̌a.
translations.translated_sentence: ลาก่อน! ขอบคุณที่ช่วยเหลือ.

vocabularies.definition: A casual way to say goodbye, indicating you'll meet again.
vocabularies.sentence: See you at the airport later!

translations.sentence_transliteration: Mata ne! Kuukoo de mata ato de!
translations.translated_sentence: また会おう！空港でまた後で！

translations.sentence_transliteration: Zài jiàn! Děng yī xià zài jī chǎng jiàn!
translations.translated_sentence: 再见！等一下在机场见！

translations.sentence_transliteration: See you at the airport later!
translations.translated_sentence: See you at the airport later!

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tto bwayo! Gonghangeseo najunge bwayo!
translations.translated_sentence: 또 봐요! 공항에서 나중에 봐요!

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hẹn gặp lại! Gặp lại tại sân bay sau nhé!
translations.translated_sentence: Hẹn gặp lại! Gặp lại tại sân bay sau nhé!

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sampai jumpa! Sampai jumpa di bandara nanti!
translations.translated_sentence: Sampai jumpa! Sampai jumpa di bandara nanti!

translations.sentence_transliteration: Laeo phóp gan! Phóp gan thîi sanaam bin thii lang!
translations.translated_sentence: แล้วพบกัน! พบกันที่สนามบินทีหลัง!

vocabularies.definition: A phrase used when meeting someone for the first time.
vocabularies.sentence: Nice to meet you! I'm visiting from another country.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hajimemashite! Gaikoku kara kite imasu.
translations.translated_sentence: はじめまして！外国から来ています。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hěn gāo xìng rèn shí nǐ! Wǒ cóng qí tā guó jiā lái cān guān.
translations.translated_sentence: 很高兴认识你！我从其他国家来参观。
translations.word_transliteration: Hěn gāo xìng rèn shí nǐ

translations.sentence_transliteration: Nice to meet you! I'm visiting from another country.
translations.translated_sentence: Nice to meet you! I'm visiting from another country.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Mannaseo bangapseumnida! Dareun naraeseo wajyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 만나서 반갑습니다! 다른 나라에서 왔어요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Rất vui được gặp bạn! Tôi đến từ nước khác.
translations.translated_sentence: Rất vui được gặp bạn! Tôi đến từ nước khác.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Senang berkenalan dengan Anda! Saya berkunjung dari negara lain.
translations.translated_sentence: Senang berkenalan dengan Anda! Saya berkunjung dari negara lain.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Dii jai thîi dâi rúu jàk! Phǒm maa thîao jaak prathêet ɯ̀ɯn.
translations.translated_sentence: ดีใจที่ได้รู้จัก! ผมมาเที่ยวจากประเทศอื่น.
translations.translated_word: ดีใจที่ได้รู้จัก
translations.word_transliteration: Dii jai thîi dâi rúu jàk

vocabularies.definition: A question to ask about someone's well-being.
vocabularies.sentence: Hello! How are you today? Is the bus on time?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Konnichiwa! Kyou wa ogenki desu ka? Basu wa jikan doori desu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: こんにちは！今日はお元気ですか？バスは時間通りですか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Nǐ hǎo! Nǐ jīn tiān zěn me yàng? Gōng gòng qì chē zhǔn shí ma?
translations.translated_sentence: 你好！你今天怎么样？公共汽车准时吗？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hello! How are you today? Is the bus on time?
translations.translated_sentence: Hello! How are you today? Is the bus on time?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Annyeonghaseyo! Oneul eotteoseyo? Beoseuga jeongsigie wayo?
translations.translated_sentence: 안녕하세요! 오늘 어떠세요? 버스가 정시에 와요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Xin chào! Hôm nay bạn thế nào? Xe buýt có đúng giờ không?
translations.translated_sentence: Xin chào! Hôm nay bạn thế nào? Xe buýt có đúng giờ không?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Halo! Apa kabar hari ini? Apakah busnya tepat waktu?
translations.translated_sentence: Halo! Apa kabar hari ini? Apakah busnya tepat waktu?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sà-wàt-dii! Wan nii pen yang ngai? Rót-mee maa trong weelaa mái?
translations.translated_sentence: สวัสดี! วันนี้เป็นยังไง? รถเมล์มาตรงเวลาไหม?

vocabularies.definition: A polite way to get someone's attention or to pass by.
vocabularies.sentence: Excuse me, could you tell me where the restroom is?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sumimasen, toire wa doko desu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: すみません、トイレはどこですか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Bù hǎo yì si, nǐ néng gào su wǒ xǐ shǒu jiān zài nǎ lǐ ma?
translations.translated_sentence: 不好意思，你能告诉我洗手间在哪里吗？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Excuse me, could you tell me where the restroom is?
translations.translated_sentence: Excuse me, could you tell me where the restroom is?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sillyehamnida, hwajangsil eodi inneunji allyeojusil su isseoyo?
translations.translated_sentence: 실례합니다, 화장실 어디 있는지 알려주실 수 있어요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Xin lỗi, bạn có thể cho tôi biết phòng vệ sinh ở đâu không?
translations.translated_sentence: Xin lỗi, bạn có thể cho tôi biết phòng vệ sinh ở đâu không?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Permisi, bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya dimana kamar mandi?
translations.translated_sentence: Permisi, bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya dimana kamar mandi?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Khɔ̌ɔ-thôot, chûai bɔ̀ɔk dâi mái wâa hɔ̂ŋ náam yùu thîi nǎi?
translations.translated_sentence: ขอโทษ ช่วยบอกได้ไหมว่าห้องน้ำอยู่ที่ไหน?
